mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user (email, pw, nm, nick, authCd, provider) VALUES (#{email}, #{pw}, #{nm}, #{nick}, #{authCd}, #{provider})
mapper.select: SELECT iuser, nick, email, mainProfile, regdt ,(SELECT COUNT(feedIuser) FROM t_user_subscribe WHERE feedIuser = #{feedIuser} AND subscriberIuser = #{loginIuser}) AS subscriber FROM t_user WHERE iuser = #{feedIuser}
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_user
mainProfile = #{mainProfile},
pw = #{pw},
nm = #{nm},
nick = #{nick},
gender = #{gender},
birth = #{birth},
birth = null,
tel = #{tel},
WHERE iuser = #{iuser}
mapper.select: SELECT b.iuser, b.nick, b.mainProfile, CASE WHEN c.subscriberIuser IS null THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS subscriber FROM t_user_subscribe a INNER JOIN t_user b ON a.feedIuser=b.iuser LEFT JOIN t_user_subscribe c ON c.subscriberIuser = #{loginIuser} AND c.feedIuser = a.feedIuser WHERE a.subscriberIuser = #{loginIuser}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_user_subscribe WHERE feedIuser = #{feedIuser} AND subscriberIuser = #{subscriberIuser}
